subject: Re: Updates to HDST contact form required

full_threads.body: @manuel did you see this one?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
@manuel can you please create the attached form on hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Start a new page and can you please make sure the form fields are only one per line? I.e. don’t use gf_left_half etc.

You can use the page name of Occupational Therapy form.

Cheers

Hi Heath,

Thank you for setting up the spreadsheet – this is great and would be a fantastic way for me to convey information about our forms in the future. I have attached the updated spreadsheet with just a few comments/changes. I look forward to seeing the updates for review.

Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis
Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy

Website: www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au <http://www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au/>
Email: remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au <mailto:remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au>
Phone: (02) 9054 1996
Contact Days & Times: Wednesday & Friday (8.30am – 4.30pm)
Social Media: @hdspeechtherapy
CANCELLATION POLICY: All appointments at HDST are made in advance and therefore reserved to meet your specific requirements and preferences. Cancellation fees do apply. Please see our cancellation policy for more information:https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/faqs/cancellation-policy/ <https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/faqs/cancellation-policy/>

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Date: Tuesday, 8 June 2021 at 12:16 pm
To: Remona Mekdessi <remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au <mailto:remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au>>
Cc: Hills District Speech Therapy <info@hdspeechtherapy.com.au <mailto:info@hdspeechtherapy.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Updates to HDST contact form required

Hi Remona,

Thanks for getting me this extra detail and apologies for the back and forth.

I’ve been trying to get my head around the current situation and the requests and I’m a little confused. But, I’m sure we can fix it : ) I think it’s the way the formatting is happening within the emails. So I have recreated in an Excel doc to try and counteract it all.

I have focussed on the OT form initially. Please see attached and feel free to make changes directly on this spread sheet. Once we know this is what you need, we will code it and send to you for review.

Please let me know if you have any questions? Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>
<https://wolfiq.com.au/>

Hi Remona,

Hope you had an awesome weekend! Confirming that we have updated the Adult form. What we did to "Unplanned weight loss is added it as a checkbox option under Medical History and once click, it will show a text box to enter the amount. They are ready for you to review.

Here's the link: https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/contact/#AdultClients

Let us know if you would like further changes.
all good @manuel thanks a lot
@rica please check it now again. thanks

Hi Rica, Thank you for following through our request so promptly. Could you please make the following adjustments to the forms: Most of the textboxes in the form have duplicated text from the question. Could you please keep the textboxes blank? Both paediatric and adult forms: PREFERRED DAYS AND TIMES FOR ONGOING INTERVENTION (please update spelling (2nd, not 2st, 3rd not 3st), add textboxes not multiple choices)
  • 1st preference
  • 2st preference
  • 3st preference
Adult form:
  • CHEST INFECTIONS
Date Format: MM slash DD slash YYYY
  • COUGHING
Date Format: MM slash DD slash YYYY
  • CHOKING INCIDENTS
Date Format: MM slash DD slash YYYY
  • UNPLANNED WEIGHT LOSS (PLEASE SPECIFY AMOUNT)
Please remove the date format and have these listed under the heading 'Medical History' with checkboxes beside them. Please keep the textbox beside unplanned weight loss but ensure there is a checkbox too. Please see below the OT form updates that are also required. Thank you 😊 Paed Form - NEW OT CLIENTS · Contact Person's Name FILL FULL NAME · Client's name FILL FULL NAME · Age year and month · Email * mandatory* NOTE TO SAY: This is how you will be contacted initially · Contact No. · Best times for contact: · School (if applicable): · Preferred days and times for ongoing intervention ( TICK ) I'm happy to be flexible / or 1st preference: FILL 2nd preference: FILL 3rd preference: FILL *please be aware that greater flexibility will assist in receiving placement sooner and we will look for placement according to the information you have provided before getting in contact with you. · PREFERRED LOCATION (TICK BOXES) o Onsite at our Norwest clinic o Offsite* (e.g. school, preschool, home) *ADD DROP DOWN MENU to write location o No preference · Are you transitioning from another service? YES/NO (TICK) If yes, do you have a current Occupational Therapy report less than 6 months old? (TICK) Are you able to provide this to us before commencing services? (already on the form) PLEASE INDICATE IF THE CLIENT PRESENTS WITH DIFFICULTIES IN ANY OF THE FOLLOWING: · Regulation (includes regulating energy levels and/or emotions) · Self-care (including dressing, toileting, brushing teeth, eating) · Fine motor skills (including grasping a pencil, handwriting, cutting, colouring or drawing) · Play or Social skills · Gross motor skills (includes riding a bike, navigating at home and school safely, throwing and catching a ball) · School participation (includes following a routine, following instructions, attention, completing class tasks) · None of the above · Other: __________________________ · Main concerns / goals in relation to the above (please list in order of priority): · 1. · 2. · 3. · Funding type - TICK BOX no funding, Medicare, private health insurance, NDIS agency managed, NDIS self managed, NDIS planner managed This form will go to our intake team who will respond within a week VIA EMAIL to indicate your position for placement. Please check your junk email to ensure you have received this. Kind Regards,​ Remona Mekdessi Sarkis Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy Website: http://www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au/ Email: remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au Phone: (02) 9054 1996 Contact Days & Times: Wednesday & Friday (8.30am - 4.30pm) Social Media: @hdspeechtherapy CANCELLATION POLICY: All appointments at HDST are made in advance and therefore reserved to meet your specific requirements and preferences. Cancellation fees do apply. Please see our cancellation policy for more information:https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/faqs/cancellation-policy/ We acknowledge the Traditional Owners of the land on which we provide our services, and pay respect to the spiritual, physical and cultural connection they have with their country and to their Elders past, present and emerging. Any confidentiality or privilege is not waived or lost because this email has been sent to you by mistake. Please immediately contact the sender if you have received it in error.

Hi Remona,

Hope all is well. Confirming that we have updated the HDST contact form and ready for you to review.

Here's the link: https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/contact/#AllNEWBookingEnquiries

Please let us know if you would like further changes.
@rica Please check it now... 3hrs task

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

We have some updates required to our HDST contact form. We now have three on the website (new paediatric clients, new adult clients and new occupational therapy clients) but need them updated (all three are a supplicate of the standard contact form). Please see below for updates required to the paediatric form + attached for the adult form. I will send through another email soon for updates need to the OT contact form. Could you also let me know when this can be completed? Thanks!

New Paediatric clients form https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/contact/#AllNEWBookingEnquiries

· Contact Person's Name FILL FULL NAME

· Client's name FILL FULL NAME

· Age year and month

· Email * mandatory* NOTE TO SAY: This is how you will be contacted initially

· Contact No.

· Best times for contact:

· School (if applicable):

· Preferred days and times for ongoing intervention

( TICK )

I'm happy to be flexible

/ or

1st preference: FILL

2nd preference: FILL

3rd preference: FILL

*please be aware that greater flexibility will assist in receiving placement sooner and we will look for placement according to the information you have provided before getting in contact with you.

· PREFERRED LOCATION

(TICK BOXES)

o Onsite at our Norwest clinic

o Offsite* (e.g. school, preschool, home) *ADD DROP DOWN MENU to write location

o No preference

· Are you transitioning from another service? YES/NO

(TICK) If yes, do you have a current Speech Pathology report less than 6 months old?

(TICK) Are you able to provide this to us before commencing services?

(already on the form)

· PLEASE INDICATE IF THE CLIENT PRESENTS WITH THE FOLLOWING

· Language and/or speech difficulties AND is aged under 7 years

· Language and/or speech difficulties AND is aged 7 years or over

· A diagnosed lifelong disability (e.g. Autism Spectrum Disorder, Intellectual Disability, Down Syndrome)

· Difficulties with verbal communication and may require assistive technology

· Reading and/or writing difficulties

· Stuttering

· OMD(please add)

· None of the above

· Main concerns / goals in relation to the above: (please add to form)

· Funding type - TICK BOX no funding, Medicare, private health insurance, NDIS agency managed, NDIS self managed, NDIS planner managed (please add to form)

This form will go to our intake team who will respond within a week VIA EMAIL to indicate your position for placement. Please check your junk email to ensure you have received this. (please add to form)

New Adult clients https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/contact/#AdultClients

See attached.

Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis

Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy

Website: http://www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au/

Email: remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Phone: (02) 9054 1996

Contact Days & Times: Wednesday & Friday (8.30am - 4.30pm)

Social Media: @hdspeechtherapy

CANCELLATION POLICY: All appointments at HDST are made in advance and therefore reserved to meet your specific requirements and preferences. Cancellation fees do apply. Please see our cancellation policy for more information:https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/faqs/cancellation-policy/
